source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video captures a view of a city street, looking up at tall buildings on both sides. The buildings are modern with numerous windows, and the sky is partly cloudy. The camera gradually moves forward, providing a sense of motion as it approaches the buildings.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video captures a view of a city street, looking up at tall buildings on both sides. The buildings are modern with numerous windows, and the sky is partly cloudy. The camera gradually moves forward, providing a sense of motion as it approaches the buildings.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding mountain trail, weaving between large boulders and trees. The lead cyclist signals to the others before turning sharply to the left, and the group follows in single file. As they descend, dust rises behind their tires, and they eventually stop at a wooden bridge to rest.
